8a4ae0d1-12d2-4424-bd55-42a40bf8ae76.name: VM on Local Datastore
8a4ae0d1-12d2-4424-bd55-42a40bf8ae76.formula: min(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=Datastore, metric=System Attributes|availability, depth=1, where = "summary|isLocal equals true"})
8a4ae0d1-12d2-4424-bd55-42a40bf8ae76.description:
Identifies whether the VM is on a local datastore.

1 = Yes
0 = No
